name: The Love Letter (2012)
description:
You're the most popular boy in school, and you've just received a love letter from a secret admirer. You've got 5 minutes to read the entire letter without being caught by your nosy schoolmates.

Made for Ludum Dare 22 by Patrick Kemp and axcho with music by Teo Acosta.

Blog post by axcho: http://evolutionlive.blogspot.com/2012/02/love-letter-released.html

Ludum Dare page (#1 for Theme!): http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-22/?uid=8060

On DeviantArt (Daily Deviation!): https://www.deviantart.com/axcho/art/The-Love-Letter-289182364

On Kongregate: https://www.kongregate.com/games/axcho/the-love-letter

On Newgrounds: https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/590938

Fan wiki page: https://nitromepixellove.fandom.com/wiki/The_Love_Letter
